channel.title: Comments on: Moralpolitik and the Ressentiments of Change
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: Max S.
item.dc:creator: Max S.
item.description: lovely piece, kells. makes me think of my experience in garmisch-partenkirchen - further evidence of a belief i'll hold no matter how naive the news makes it out to be, that individuals sharing space, kindness and access can resolve problems even of this magnitude.
item.content:encoded: lovely piece, kells. makes me think of my experience in garmisch-partenkirchen – further evidence of a belief i’ll hold no matter how naive the news makes it out to be, that individuals sharing space, kindness and access can resolve problems even of this magnitude.
